page.title: 05Patchway Children's Games.
page.content: High Low Dolly Pepper My Red Letter Teddy Bear Co Co Blue Bells Offground Touch Bumper Car Water Fight Mob Mob Eggy Peggy Hide and Seek I Spy Cat and Mouse Give Us A Clue Sticky Toffee Ball Touch Rounders French Cricket Chase Cricket Creep Mouse Football High Low Dolly Pepper ----- To play this you need three people or more. You need a skipping rope too. Two people turn the rope and one person skips. You sing high, low, dolly, pepper, and if you stop on any of those words, one tells you what to do. For high the rope will be up high, for low you bend down low,for dolly you turn around and for pepper you skip fast.
